properties.areaDesc: Central and Southwest Mountains; Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Southern Utah Mountains; Western Uinta Mountains; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 1 at 2:16PM MST until February 4 at 4:00AM MST by NWS Salt Lake City UT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16
inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph.

* WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North, Wasatch Mountains South
of I-80, Western Uinta Mountains, Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs,
Central Mountains and Southern Mountains.

* WHEN...From 10 PM Sunday to 4 AM MST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel could be very difficult to
impossible on all routes. The hazardous conditions will impact
the morning and evening commutes on Monday. Blowing snow will
cause additional visibility reductions.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including
Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit
weather.gov/slc/winter.

For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of
Transportation, visit
http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial
511.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM SUNDAY TO 4 AM MST TUESDAY
